title: Caramel Apple Oreo Cookie Review - Oreo Oration
description:
All the flavor, none of the wood.

This episode is because of your support on Patreon. Thank you: http://www.patreon.com/kindafunny

SUBSCRIBE / LIKE / SHARE / BUY A SHIRT: http://www.districtlines.com/kindafunny

While you were living your life, Nabisco went crazy and made an army of Oreo cookies. Whenever a noteworthy cookie comes, Greg Miller tears open a new package and reviews a new version of Milk's Favorite Cookie. 

Subscribe so you don't miss a review: http://www.youtube.com/user/kindafunny?sub_confirmation=1

Let us know what Oreo we should review next in the comments.

Follow Greg on Twitter: http://www.twitter.com/gameovergreggy

Like Greg on Facebook: http://facebook.com/gameovergreggy

Check out the Oreo Oration FAQ: http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aO6zw2LeJ3c&list=PLOlEpGVXWUVseSo6bQHB1ad2cN_qV3aXs&index=1

Our theme is "Game-A-Tron" off of Daemon Hatfield's album Colorbeam. Buy it on iTunes: https://itunes.apple.com/us/album/colorbeam/id426986325

Thanks to Nick and Tim for filming.

Mega-Thanks to Matt Gravish for making the Oreo Oration logo and intro.
